cards.title: Straight Lead Punch
cards.description: A fast and direct punch designed to intercept an opponent's attack.
bulletpoints: Extend the arm directly forward with minimal movement
Strike from the centerline for maximum efficiency
Use explosive speed and minimal telegraphing
cards.summaryText: Snap the straight lead from centerline with zero telegraph to meet the attack mid-launch.

cards.title: Stop-Hit Counter
cards.description: A defensive counter that disrupts an incoming attack before it lands.
bulletpoints: Time the strike just as the opponent initiates movement
Use the least amount of force necessary for interruption
Follow up immediately with an offensive combination
cards.summaryText: Intercept with a stop-hit the instant they move, then flow into your finishing combo.
